mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn,no,nicname,regDate,title,personNO from (select b.no no,nicname,reg_date regDate,title,person_NO personNO from center b,person r where b.person_NO=r.no and flag=1 order by b.no)) where rn<=#{endNum} and rn>#{startNum} order by rn desc

select * from (select rownum rn,no,nicname,regDate,title,personNO from (select b.no no,nicname,reg_date regDate,title,person_NO personNO from center b,person r where b.person_NO=r.no and flag=2 order by b.no)) where rn<=#{endNum} and rn>#{startNum} order by rn desc

select rn,no,personNo,centerNo,content,regDate,nicname from(select rownum rn,no,personNo,centerNo,content,regDate,nicname from (select c.no no, c.person_no personNo, c.center_no centerNo,c.content content,c.reg_date regDate,p.nicname nicname from center_comment c,person p where p.no=c.person_no) where centerNo=#{no} order by no desc) order by rn
select count(*) from center where flag=0
select count(*) from center where flag=1
select count(*) from center where flag=2
select count(*) from (select * from center b, person r where b.person_NO=r.no) where title like #{nicname} or nicname like #{nicname}

select * from (select rownum rn,no,nicname,regDate,title,personNO from (select b.no no,nicname,reg_date regDate,title,person_NO personNO from center b,person r where b.person_NO = r.no order by b.no) where title like #{nicname} or nicname like #{nicname}) where rn<=#{endNum} and rn>#{startNum} order by rn desc
